title: Our Most Anticipated Movies of Summer 2023 | The Recap
description:
This week on The Recap, Marty, Frost and Darren discuss the big movies they're looking forward to of Summer 2023.

title: Redfall | The Editor's Hour
description:
We're switching things up for The Editor's Hour this year! Nick will be working on games in his backlog and keep track of how many games he completes through the year.
